translation: 他们证言中的这个细节一直让你觉得不对劲。

original: But you dismissed your suspicions.[p/] They found Justin's body in the vat, after all.
translation: 但桶里找到的正是贾斯汀本人的尸体，[p/]所以你打消了疑虑。

original: You know for a fact that [i]he[/i] fell into that vat.
translation: 你知道<u>他</u>的确掉进了桶里。

original: But you never considered one other possibility...
translation: 但你从没想过另外一种可能……

original: Justin survived the accident.
translation: 贾斯汀从事故中生还了。

original: Could Justin have survived the accident?
translation: 贾斯汀会不会从事故中生还了？

original: No...[p/] He was drenched in several corrosive and volatile chemicals.
translation: 不对……[p/]他被浸泡在几种腐蚀性极强的化学品中。

original: Even [i]if[/i] he somehow got out of the vat in time,[p/] he would have left some kind of trail behind.
translation: <u>哪怕</u>他真能及时逃出生天，[p/]起码也会留下些许痕迹。

original: It's unfortunate...[p/] But Justin definitely didn't survive.
translation: 很遗憾……[p/]贾斯汀并无生还的可能。

original: Another person fell into the vat.
translation: 掉进桶里的是另一个人。

original: Justin didn't fall into the vat.
translation: 贾斯汀没有掉进桶里。

original: Is it possible that Justin [i]didn't[/i] fall into the vat?
translation: 有没有可能，贾斯汀<u>没有</u>掉进桶里呢？

original: No...[p/] Rika testified that she saw him fall off of the walkway.
translation: 不对……[p/]里卡作证说，她见到贾斯汀从走道掉了下去。

original: If he had somehow climbed back up,[p/] someone would have seen him leave the refinery.
translation: 如果他爬了回来，[p/]离开精炼厂时应该会被人看到。

original: And if he'd fallen onto the ground,[p/] that [i]definitely[/i] would have left evidence behind.
translation: 如果他掉到地面上，[p/]也<u>必然</u>会留下一丝线索。

original: Another person...?[p/][s/] Is that really possible?!
translation: 难道还有另一个人……？[p/][s/]真有这种可能吗？！

original: But...[p/] It's the only thing that makes sense.
translation: 可是……[p/]只有这样才说得通。

original: It would also explain how Rika, Morrison, and Aster all saw someone fall off of the walkway at different times.
translation: 里卡、莫里森、阿斯特在不同的时间里看到某个人掉进桶里的问题，也得到了解释。

original: But then...[p/][s/] Who is this second person?!
translation: 但话又说回来……[p/][s/]另一个人究竟是谁？！

original: Ugh...[p/] You don't have a choice.
translation: 唉……[p/]你别无选择。

original: Even if you don't know all of the facts,[p/] this is the only conclusion you can draw.
translation: 诚然，你还不清楚案件的全貌，[p/]但你只能得出这一个结论了。

original: Judge: I think you've had [i]quite[/i] enough time to deliberate, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Judge: 我认为你的审议时间<u>足够</u>久了，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Judge: Are you accusing the witness or not?!
translation: Judge: 你究竟是不是在指控证人作伪证？！

original: Tyrion: I am not accusing the witness of perjury, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: 我并没有指控证人作伪证，法官阁下。

original: Tyrion: Both Ms. Tudor's and Mr. Morrison's testimonies [i]appear[/i] to contradict each other.
translation: Tyrion: 都铎女士和莫里森先生的证言<u>看似</u>互相矛盾。

original: Tyrion: But they are both telling the truth.
translation: Tyrion: 但他们两人说的都是事实。

original: Aria: Then please enlighten us, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 那么请赐教吧，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aria: How could [i]both[/i] of their testimonies possibly be true?
translation: Aria: 他们两人的证词怎么可能<u>同时</u>为真？

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] I think there's only one possible explanation.
translation: Tyrion: 唔，[p/]我想只有一种可能的解释。

original: Tyrion: Both Ms. Tudor and Mr. Morrison saw [i]someone[/i] fall off of the walkway.
translation: Tyrion: 都铎女士和莫里森先生都看见<u>有人</u>掉下了走道。

original: Tyrion: But the person that Ms. Tudor saw and the person that Mr. Morrison saw...
translation: Tyrion: 但是都铎女士和莫里森先生看见的……

original: Tyrion: ...were two different people!
translation: Tyrion: ……是两个不一样的人！

original: Aria: Are you serious, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Aria: 你是在说笑吗，卡斯伯特先生？

original: Aria: Do you honestly think some [i]random[/i] person fell into the vat moments [i]after[/i] Justin Waye fell in?
translation: Aria: 难道你真觉得，贾斯汀·维耶落入桶中<u>之后</u>，没过多久，有个<u>路人</u>也掉下去了？

original: Tyrion: It's the only conclusion that makes sense, Ms. Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion: 这是唯一合理的解释，斯蒂尔文德女士。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tudor knew the victim and recognized him.[p/] [i]That's[/i] how she was able to confirm that it was him that fell into the vat.
translation: Tyrion: 都铎女士认识受害者，认出了他的脸。[p/]<u>因此</u>她才能断定，掉进桶里的就是贾斯汀。

original: Tyrion: However,[p/] Mr. Morrison and his companion did [i]not[/i] know the victim personally.[p/] They could barely make out his features.
translation: Tyrion: 然而，[p/]莫里森两人<u>并不</u>认识受害人。[p/]他们两个都看不清他长什么模样。

original: Tyrion: They only assumed that it was him [i]after[/i] learning that he fell in.
translation: Tyrion: 他们只能在得知贾斯汀坠入桶中<u>之后</u>，假设当时看到的就是他。

original: Aria: Please.
translation: Aria: 拜托你清醒一点。

original: Aria: It's far more likely that Ms. Tudor is simply mistaken about what she saw.
translation: Aria: 很可能只是都铎女士搞错了。

original: Mosourika: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Mosourika: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Mosourika: N-[p/]No![p/][s/] I'm sure I saw Justin tumble [i]over[/i] the guard rail.
translation: Mosourika: 你、[p/]你胡说！[p/][s/]我很确定，我看到贾斯汀<u>翻过</u>了护栏。

original: Aria: And let's not forget Ms. Tudor's allegiances.
translation: Aria: 别忘了都铎女士效忠的对象。

original: Aria: As a beneficiary of the Dracogen Trading Company,[p/] she has every reason to confound this case in the defendant's favor.
translation: Aria: 她是德拉科根贸易公司的受益者，[p/]没有理由不帮着被告混淆视听。

original: Mosourika: T-[p/][s/]That's not-!
translation: Mosourika: 我、[p/][s/]我没有——！

original: Judge: That's enough!
translation: Judge: 够了！

original: Judge: This is a civil case, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] Not some murder mystery for you to throw wild theories towards.
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生，这是一起民事案件，[p/]不是悬疑推理，不需要你发挥天马行空的想象力。

original: It looks like you don't have a choice.
translation: 看来你别无选择了。

original: You're going to have to use your trump card.
translation: 你只能拿出杀手锏了。

original: You have one piece of evidence that implies that this wasn't a simple accident.
translation: 你有一份证据，可以说明这并非一起单纯的事故。

original: No…[p/] That’s not right.
translation: 不对……[p/]再好好想想。

original: You have a piece of evidence that could flip this entire case on its head.
translation: 你掌握的某个证据足以将整个案子掀个底朝天。

original: Now is the time to PRESENT it.
translation: 现在正是 <size=1.5em>出示</size> 证据的时机。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Are you sure about that, Your Honor?
translation: Tyrion: 你确定吗，法官阁下？

original: Aria: ...What?
translation: Aria: ……什么意思？

original: Tyrion: Justin Waye's death was reported as an unfortunate accident.
translation: Tyrion: 贾斯汀·维耶之死被立案登记为一场不幸的事故。

original: Tyrion: As a result,[p/] the city guard put minimal resources into their investigation.
translation: Tyrion: 结果，[p/]城市安保调查时只投入了极少的警力。

original: Tyrion: More specifically,[p/] there was no reason to call in the Arcane Inquisition.
translation: Tyrion: 说得更确切些，[p/]他们认为没必要通知奥术裁判所。

original: Aria: What are you talking about now?!
translation: Aria: 你在说什么？！

original: Aria: Why would the Inquisition be-...?
translation: Aria: 这跟裁判所有什么——？

original: Aria: No...![p/][s/] Are you saying that-?
translation: Aria: 不是吧……！[p/][s/]你是想说——？

original: Tyrion: Unlike the Aurinax City Guard,[p/] [i]I[/i] have a mage capable of casting [i]Detect Magic[/i].
translation: Tyrion: 与欧奥耐克斯城市安保不同的是，[p/]<u>我</u>这里有个法师，会用<u>法术探测</u>。

original: Tyrion: My bodyguard,[p/] Celeste McCoy,[p/] scanned the crime scene for magical traces...
translation: Tyrion: 我的贴身护卫，[p/]塞莱斯特·麦考伊，[p/]在犯罪现场扫描出了魔法痕迹……

original: Tyrion: ...And she found traces of [b]transmutation[/b] on the broken guard rail!
translation: Tyrion: ……而且她在护栏断裂处发现了[b]形变术[/b]的痕迹！

original: Judge: Traces of [i]magic[/i] were found at the crime scene?!
translation: Judge: 在犯罪现场发现了<u>魔法</u>的痕迹？！

original: Judge: But that would make this-!
translation: Judge: 那这个案子不就变成了——！

original: Tyrion: A potential homicide, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: 一起潜在的杀人案，法官阁下。

original: Aria: T-[p/][s/]This is ridiculous!
translation: Aria: 太、[p/][s/]太可笑了！

original: Aria: The accident took place within an Arcane Refinery!
translation: Aria: 这起意外发生在奥术精炼厂里！

original: Aria: Those traces could have easily come from the purification process.
translation: Aria: 你发现的魔法痕迹很可能是精炼过程中残留下来的。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Steelwind.[p/] These traces were found [i]only[/i] on the guard rails that Justin broke.
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德女士，[p/]我<u>只</u>在贾斯汀弄断的护栏上发现了魔法痕迹。

original: Tyrion: We didn't find them anywhere else.
translation: Tyrion: 其他地方半点儿也没有。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Tyrion: We can't be certain of [i]what[/i] happened.
translation: Tyrion: 当时是<u>什么情况</u>，我们还不能确定。

original: Tyrion: But it's clear that a mage used magic near the scene of the accident.
translation: Tyrion: 但显然，有一名法师在事故现场附近使用了魔法。

original: Tyrion: Foul play may have been involved!
translation: Tyrion: 不能排除他杀的可能性！

original: Tyrion: So, my theory of another person falling into the vat is entirely possible!
translation: Tyrion: 因此，我假设还有另一个人落入桶中，完全合情合理！

original: Tyrion: My client is [i]not[/i] at fault for the guard rail breaking!
translation: Tyrion: 护栏断裂，该负责的<u>不是</u>我的委托人！

original: Judge: ...
translation: Judge: ……

original: Judge: Considering this shocking revelation,[p/] there is still much we do not know about Justin Waye's death.
translation: Judge: 这一发现太过惊人，[p/]足见我们对贾斯汀·维耶之死仍然知之甚少。

original: Judge: With that said,[p/] I have no choice but to suspend the trial of von Sanctus vs Dracogen.
translation: Judge: 因此，[p/]我别无选择，只能中止对冯·桑克图斯诉德拉科根案的审理。

original: You had a feeling that this would happen.
translation: 会变成这样，你早有预期。

original: Just like your other cases,[p/] the court won't pass a verdict unless a culprit is found.
translation: 和你之前经手的案子一样，[p/]法院找到罪魁祸首之前不会做出判决。

original: Judge: The court will give the Arcane Inquisition time to investigate the scene and these supposed magical traces.
translation: Judge: 法庭将给奥术裁判所时间来调查案发现场的情况，以及所谓的魔法痕迹。

original: Judge: We will resume the trial in two days' time.
translation: Judge: 庭审将在两天后继续。

original: Judge: Court is adjourned.
translation: Judge: 休庭。

original: Celeste: *sigh*[p/] Well,[p/] at least we survived the first day.
translation: Celeste: *叹气* [p/]还好，[p/]起码咱们撑过了第一天。

original: Celeste: But it kind of feels like we're back to square one.
translation: Celeste: 感觉我们兜兜转转又回到了原点。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……

original: The Inquisition will get involved.[p/] They know that magic played a role in what happened.
translation: 裁判所将会介入。[p/]他们知道此案涉及了魔法。

original: If you want them to dismiss the case against Dracogen,[p/] you're going to have to find out [i]exactly[/i] what happened.
translation: 想让他们撤回对德拉科根的上诉，[p/]就得查明当时<u>具体</u>的来龙去脉。

original: ...If that's even possible.
translation: ……也不知道你能不能做到。

original: Tyrion: Agh...
translation: Tyrion: 啊……

original: Celeste: H-[p/][s/]Hey![p/] Are you okay?
translation: Celeste: 喂、[p/][s/]我说！[p/]你还好吗？

original: You feel a headache coming on.
translation: 你渐渐觉得头昏欲裂。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I think I'm just...[p/] tired.
translation: Tyrion: 没事……[p/]我应该就是……[p/]有点累。

original: Celeste: Well,[p/] this day [i]has[/i] been exhausting.
translation: Celeste: 哎，[p/]今天<u>确实</u>把人累得够呛。

original: Celeste: It's pretty late.[p/] Should we just head back to the inn and continue the investigation tomorrow?
translation: Celeste: 时间也不早了，[p/]我们要不先回旅店休息，明天再开始调查？

original: Tyrion: N-[p/]No...[p/] I want to take another look at the refinery before the Inquisition gets there.
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/]不行……[p/]趁裁判所还没到，我还想再去精炼厂看一眼……

original: Tyrion: Agh!
translation: Tyrion: 呃啊！

original: The throbbing pain in your skull seems to disagree with you doing that.
translation: 你脑袋里的剧烈抽痛似乎并不赞同你这么做。

original: Celeste: Yeah,[p/] no.[p/] We're heading back to the inn.
translation: Celeste: 不，[p/]算了，[p/]我们回旅店。

original: Tyrion: I'm fine...[p/] Really.
translation: Tyrion: 我没事……[p/]真的。

original: Celeste: Tyrion, I know you're anxious about the trial.[p/] But you need to get some rest.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂，我知道你忧心审理的事，[p/]但你得休息一下。

original: Tyrion: Celeste.[p/] It's fine.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，[p/]没事的。

original: Celeste: It's not.[p/] You're going to work yourself-
translation: Celeste: 并不是。[p/]你会把自己……

original: Tyrion: Would you just stay out of my way?!
translation: Tyrion: 你可以别碍事了吗？！

original: Again,[p/] your voice came out louder than you meant for it to.
translation: 又一次，[p/]你的声音比你预想的要更大。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Fine.[p/] Whatever.[p/] Do what you want.
translation: Celeste: 行。[p/]无所谓。[p/]你想干嘛就干嘛吧。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: It's this damn city...[p/] Being back here is really getting to you.
translation: 都怪这个该死的城市……[p/]回到这儿让你非常烦躁。

original: That's all the more reason to get through this trial as soon as possible.
translation: 这也是尽快结束这场审理的另一个理由。

original: ...The soreness in your head doesn't seem to be going away anytime soon.
translation: ……你脑袋的疼痛似乎一时半会儿好不了。

original: Perhaps she's right.[p/] You'll be better off investigating the scene after some rest.
translation: 也许她是对的。[p/]休息一下再去调查现场，你会好受些。

original: A long flight of stairs leads to the upper parts of von Sanctus' manor.
translation: 长长的楼梯通向冯·桑克图斯庄园的上层。

original: You're a bit tempted to snoop around...[p/] But it'd be best not to take such risks.
translation: 你有点想四处打探……[p/]但最好别冒这种险。

original: Aster: I heard about the charges that you've brought against the Dracogen Trading Company.
translation: Aster: 我听说了你对德拉科根贸易公司提出的指控。

original: Aster: Forgive my bluntness,[p/] but is everything well within your estate?
translation: Aster: 抱歉我这么直接，[p/]不过你家里还好吗？

original: Lloyd: O-[p/]Oh,[p/] that.
translation: Lloyd: 噢、[p/]噢，[p/]那个啊。

original: Lloyd: I am simply...[p/] cleaning house.[p/] Nothing more.
translation: Lloyd: 我只是……[p/]收拾一下家务。[p/]就这样。

original: Lloyd: I've dealt with plenty of men like Dracogen before.[p/] And this time will be no different.
translation: Lloyd: 我以前跟不少德拉科根这样的人打过交道，[p/]这次也不例外。

original: Aster: I understand that he may be taking business away from you.
translation: Aster: 我知道他可能抢了你的生意。

original: Aster: But does that really warrant you taking such drastic measures?
translation: Aster: 但这真的值得你采取这么极端的手段吗？

original: Lloyd: It's not just about his business.[p/] It's these ideas that he's putting into people's heads.
translation: Lloyd: 不只是他的生意的事，[p/]还有他往人们脑子里灌输的那些想法。

original: Lloyd: He's allowed these...[p/] "unions" to continue existing.
translation: Lloyd: 他纵容这些……[p/]“工会”继续存在。

original: Lloyd: And other businesses are following his example.
translation: Lloyd: 其他企业也在效仿他。

original: Lloyd: It's absolutely absurd.[p/] It's as if the entire world has gone mad.
translation: Lloyd: 这太荒唐了。[p/]整个世界都像疯了一样。

original: Aster: I see...
translation: Aster: 我明白了……

original: Lloyd: Our society only functions when the lower class knows their place.
translation: Lloyd: 只有底层民众安分守己，我们的社会才能正常运转。

original: Aster: If that's how our society functions,[p/] then perhaps it is flawed...
translation: Aster: 如果我们的社会是这么运转的，[p/]那它可能就有问题……

original: Lloyd: ...You're still young, Prince Aster.
translation: Lloyd: ……你还太年轻了，阿斯特王子。

original: Lloyd: These "righteous" ideals may sound appealing,[p/] but they are the path to disorder.
translation: Lloyd: 这些“正义”的观念听起来或许很有吸引力，[p/]但它们只会通向混乱。

original: Lloyd: The commonfolk do not care about the well-being of our kingdom as a whole.
translation: Lloyd: 平民不会为整个王国的福祉着想。

original: Lloyd: They only care about themselves individually.
translation: Lloyd: 他们只关心自己的利益。

original: Lloyd: If we allow them to become empowered,[p/] they will use that power selfishly.
translation: Lloyd: 如果我们给予平民权力，[p/]他们只会考虑自己。

original: Lloyd: It is up to the upper class to maintain order.
translation: Lloyd: 秩序需要贵族阶层来维持。

original: Aster: I-[p/]I see.
translation: Aster: 我、[p/]我明白了。

original: Aster: By the way,[p/] I'm surprised that you're representing Lord von Sanctus, Lady Steelwind.
translation: Aster: 顺便一提，[p/]我没想到冯·桑克图斯勋爵的代理人会是你，斯蒂尔文德女士。

original: CAria: O-[p/]Oh, right.
translation: CAria: 哦、[p/]哦，对。

original: What is he doing...?[p/] It's already hard enough to maintain this ruse.
translation: 他在干嘛……？[p/]要维持这个计谋已经很不容易了。

original: Aster: I knew that you recently became a prosecutor.[p/] But I never imagined that you'd represent a noble.
translation: Aster: 我知道你最近当了一名检察官。[p/]但我从没想到你会代理贵族出庭。

original: CAria: Don't get ahead of yourself, Aster.
translation: CAria: 阿斯特，别急着下结论。

original: ...What does that even mean?
translation: ……那到底是什么意思？

original: Lloyd: Let's not be coy, Lady Steelwind.
translation: Lloyd: 别遮遮掩掩的，斯蒂尔文德女士。

original: Lloyd: If you must know, Your Majesty.[p/] House Steelwind and I came to an arrangement.
translation: Lloyd: 陛下，我得告诉您。[p/]斯蒂尔文德家与我达成了协议。

original: Lloyd: The [i]fair lady[/i] is so keen on wasting her talents on civil work.
translation: Lloyd: 这位<u>美丽的女士</u>热衷于将自己的才华浪费在平民的工作上。

original: Lloyd: Given that,[p/] I might as well utilize her to my benefit.
translation: Lloyd: 鉴于此，[p/]我不妨让她的才能为我所用。

original: Aster: ...Do [i]not[/i] speak to her like that.
translation: Aster: ……<u>不许</u>这样说她。

original: Lloyd: O-[p/][s/]Oh,[p/][s/] I meant no disrespect.
translation: Lloyd: 啊、[p/][s/]哦，[p/][s/]我绝无不敬之意。

original: Lloyd: B-[p/]But rest assured,[p/] this is only temporary.
translation: Lloyd: 但、[p/]但请放心，[p/]这只是暂时的。

original: Aster: I see...[p/] So you have an arrangement with Lucio Steelwind.
translation: Aster: 我明白了……[p/]看来你与卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德有个约定。

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: It seems that Aster is collecting his own information.
translation: 看来阿斯特正在问些他想问的。

original: Aster: By the way Lord von Sanctus,[p/] have any of your attendants gone missing lately?
translation: Aster: 对了，冯·桑克图斯勋爵。[p/]最近你的随从里有人失踪吗？

original: Lloyd: That's an...[p/] oddly specific question.
translation: Lloyd: 那可真是……[p/]非常具体的问题。

original: Lloyd: But no.[p/] All of my attendants are accounted for.
translation: Lloyd: 但没有，[p/]我所有随从都已到齐。

original: You don't see any dissonant thoughts from the Eye.
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼没有发现什么异常。

original: But he could be unconsciously shielding himself from it.
translation: 不过他也可能是下意识地隐藏自己的真实想法。

original: Lloyd: I must ask.[p/] Why would you ask such a question?
translation: Lloyd: 不得不说，[p/]为什么您要问这样的问题？

original: Aster: You see...[p/] I actually found a discarded trinket while walking around the city.
translation: Aster: 你也知道……[p/]其实我在城市里散步时找到了一个被丢弃的小首饰。

original: Aster: It had the crest of House Von Sanctus on it.
translation: Aster: 上面有冯·桑克图斯家的纹章。

original: Aster: I was worried that something unsavory might have happened to one of your people.
translation: Aster: 我担心你的人是否遇到了些麻烦。

original: Lloyd: Ah, I see.
translation: Lloyd: 啊，原来是这样。

original: Lloyd: I suppose you must be on edge after what happened to your ship.
translation: Lloyd: 我想您一定是因为船的那件事太紧张了。

original: Lloyd: However,[p/] items with the Von Sanctus crest are quite common nowadays.
translation: Lloyd: 不过，[p/]带有冯·桑克图斯家纹章的物品现在挺常见的。

original: Aster: Really?
translation: Aster: 真的？

original: Lloyd: The item that you found must have been a product produced by Von Sanctus Industries.
translation: Lloyd: 您找到的物品可能只是一件由冯·桑克图斯工业生产的产品。

original: An item produced by Von Sanctus Industries?
translation: 由冯·桑克图斯工业生产的产品？

original: Aster: So the Von Sanctus crest is on some of the items produced by your company...
translation: Aster: 所以说你公司的产品上会有冯·桑克图斯的纹章……

original: Lloyd: Not just "some" of the items.
translation: Lloyd: 不止是<u>一些</u>产品。

original: Lloyd: The Von Sanctus crest is engraved on [i]every[/i] product created by Von Sanctus Industries.
translation: Lloyd: 冯·桑克图斯纹章刻在<u>所有</u>冯·桑克图斯工业的产品上。

original: Lloyd: As a result,[p/] people have come to associate the quality of our products with the quality of House Von Sanctus.
translation: Lloyd: 这样，[p/]人们就能将我们产品的质量与冯·桑克图斯家的品质相关联。

original: Lloyd: ...Or at least they [i]did[/i] until hacks like Dracogen came out of the woodwork.
translation: Lloyd: ……至少在德拉科根这种家伙突然出现之前是这样的。

original: So in other words,[p/] it's just branding.
translation: 所以换句话说，[p/]只是品牌营销咯。

original: CAria: What type of products does Von Sanctus Industries produce?
translation: CAria: 冯·桑克图斯工业生产何种产品？

original: Lloyd: We used to produce magical accessories for mages.
translation: Lloyd: 我们曾为法师生产魔法配件。

original: Lloyd: But now we produce all manner of products.
translation: Lloyd: 但现在我们生产各式各样的产品。

original: Lloyd: As the head of commerce in our kingdom,[p/] we've diversified our holdings.
translation: Lloyd: 作为我们王国的商业巨头，[p/]我们已经实现持股多样化。

original: CAria: Oh...
translation: CAria: 哦……

original: Ugh...[p/] That means the metal shard could have come from anything...
translation: 呃……[p/]那不就是说金属碎片可以来自于任何地方吗……

original: You probably shouldn't PRESENT things to him while disguised as a butler.
translation: 或许不应该在伪装成管家时，向他 <size=1.5em>出示</size> 什么证据。

original: Celeste: So [i]this[/i] is von Sanctus' house.
translation: Celeste: 所以，<u>这里</u>就是冯·桑克图斯的房子。

original: It'd be more appropriate to call this building a "palace" rather than a house.
translation: 称作这个建筑为“宫殿”可比房子更恰当。

original: Celeste: Ugh...[p/] What's that smell?
translation: Celeste: 呃……[p/]什么味道？

original: As you head further into the manor,[p/] you're hit with a very pungent and sour odor.
translation: 当你进入庄园时，[p/]一股刺鼻的酸味扑面而来。

original: It almost burns the interior of your nostrils every time you inhale.
translation: 每次吸气时这股气味都好似要烧掉你的鼻腔。

original: Hm...[p/] It seems this line of questioning led to a dead end.
translation: 嗯……[p/]这条思路似乎陷入了死胡同。

original: Damn it...[p/] Is it really impossible to identify where that shard came from?
translation: 可恶……[p/]难道真的无法分辨那碎片是从哪来的吗？

original: CAria: ...Do you sell your products to the Dracogen Trading Company?
translation: CAria: ……你有向德拉科根贸易公司销售过产品吗？

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Lloyd: Yes.[p/] Of course I do.
translation: Lloyd: 是的，[p/]那当然。

original: Lloyd: Despite my misgivings with Dracogen,[p/] it would be foolish of me if I didn't do business with him.
translation: Lloyd: 尽管我对德拉科根有诸多不满，[p/]但如果不跟他做生意，那我就太傻了。

original: CAria: That means that there [i]are[/i] Von Sanctus products in the Arcane Refinery.
translation: CAria: 那就意味着在奥术精炼厂<u>有</u>冯·桑克图斯的产品。

original: CAria: You're called Von Sanctus [i]Industries[/i], after all.
translation: CAria: 毕竟你们公司叫冯·桑克图斯<u>工业</u>。

original: ...That's true![p/][s/] The metal shard could have been from some sort of industrial tool!
translation: ……没错！[p/][s/]金属碎片可能来自某种工业工具！

original: Lloyd: ...Just what are you implying, Lady Steelwind?
translation: Lloyd: ……你在暗示什么呢，斯蒂尔文德女士？

original: A twinge of nervousness through the Eye...?[p/] Does he know something?
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼感到了他的紧张……[p/]他知道些什么吗？

original: Why would he get so defensive over a question like that?
translation: 他为什么会因这个问题变得这么戒备呢？

original: CAria: Was there a Von Sanctus product in the refinery on the night of the murder?
translation: CAria: 谋杀发生的那天晚上，精炼厂里有冯·桑克图斯的产品吗？

original: Lloyd: ...!
translation: Lloyd: ……！

original: She misspoke and said "murder" instead of "accident"...
translation: 她口误把“事故”说成了“谋杀”……

original: But that [i]is[/i] evoking a reaction.
translation: 但这<u>确实</u>引起了反应。

original: CAria: Answer the question, Von-!
translation: CAria: 回答问题，冯——！

original: Celeste attempts to loudly slam the tip of her cane on the ground.
translation: 塞莱斯特试图用力地敲手杖。

original: ...Only to realize that her "cane" isn't actually real.
translation: ……却发现她的“手杖”并不是真的。

original: She loses her balance and tips over a nearby vase.
translation: 她失去平衡，撞倒了旁边的一个花瓶。

original: The vase shatters on the ground,[p/] creating quite a mess of broken shards and water.
translation: 花瓶在地上摔得粉碎，[p/]碎片和水散了一地。

original: Aster: Cel-[p/] Lady Steelwind, are you okay?!
translation: Aster: 塞——[p/]斯蒂尔文德女士，你没事吧？！

original: Celeste immediately regains her balance and tries to act as if nothing happened.
translation: 塞莱斯特马上恢复了平衡，装作什么都没发生的样子。

original: CAria: ...
translation: CAria: ……

original: CAria: I'm not paying for that.
translation: CAria: 我可不赔那个。

original: Lloyd: Agh!
translation: Lloyd: 啊！

original: Lord von Sanctus completely loses his composure and recoils at the sight of the broken vase.
translation: 冯·桑克图斯勋爵看到摔碎的花瓶，完全失去镇定，往后一缩。

original: Lloyd: Construct![p/][s/] I require your assistance!
translation: Lloyd: 构造体！[p/][s/]我需要你的帮助！

original: Arcane: ACKNOWLEDGED.
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>遵命。</size>

original: In response to von Sanctus' call,[p/] an Arcane Construct walks out from a nearby closet.
translation: 应冯·桑克图斯勋爵的召唤，[p/]一个奥术构造体从旁边的壁橱里走出来。

original: Lloyd: Construct![p/][s/] Clean up this mess at once!
translation: Lloyd: 构造体！[p/][s/]马上清理这些垃圾！

original: He seems very disturbed by the mess...[p/] Is he some sort of clean freak?
translation: 他好像被这些碎片搞得心烦意乱……[p/]他是有洁癖吗？

original: Arcane: ACKNOWLEDGED.
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>遵命。</size>

original: The Construct begins quickly picking up the shards of the broken vase.
translation: 构造体开始迅速捡起摔碎的花瓶碎片。

original: Aster: ...You own an Arcane Construct?
translation: Aster: ……你有一个奥术构造体？

original: Lloyd: ...I do.[p/] Von Sanctus Industries is the inventor of Arcane Constructs, after all.
translation: Lloyd: ……是的。[p/]毕竟奥术构造体是冯·桑克图斯工业发明的。

original: Right.[p/] You recall Celeste mentioning that earlier.
translation: 对的，[p/]你回想起来塞莱斯特先前提过。

original: Lloyd: Would you like one, Your Highness?
translation: Lloyd: 您想要一个吗，殿下？

original: Aster: My apologies.[p/] I'm not very interested in using artificery.
translation: Aster: 不必了。[p/]我对利用奥术能源兴趣不大。

original: Lloyd: Suit yourself.
translation: Lloyd: 请随意。

original: Aster: In any case,[p/] I'm afraid "Lady Steelwind" must be taking her leave now.
translation: Aster: 总之，[p/]恐怕“斯蒂尔文德女士”现在得告辞了。

original: CAria: ...What?
translation: CAria: ……什么？

original: Aster: Remember?[p/] You said that you could only accompany me for [i]1 hour[/i].
translation: Aster: 还记得吗？[p/]你说了你只会陪我<u>一小时</u>。

original: Aster: It's close to being [i]1 hour[/i].[p/] Right, "Lady Steelwind"?
translation: Aster: 马上就要到<u>一小时</u>了，[p/]对吧，“斯蒂尔文德女士”？

original: CAria: What are you...?
translation: CAria: 你在说什……？

original: CAria: Oh![p/][s/] Right![p/][s/] [i]1 hour[/i]!
translation: CAria: 噢！[p/][s/]对的！[p/][s/]<u>一小时</u>！

original: CAria: It would definitely not be good for us to be here for more than 1 hour!
translation: CAria: 我们在这儿待的时间绝对不能超过一个小时！

original: Oh...[p/] Does this illusion only last for an hour?
translation: 噢……[p/]这个幻觉只会持续一小时吗？

original: Aster: In the meantime,[p/] may I discuss some personal matters with you Lord von Sanctus?
translation: Aster: 在此期间，[p/]我可以跟你谈些私事吗，冯·桑克图斯勋爵？

original: Lloyd: Of course.[p/] I'm at your disposal, Your Majesty.
translation: Lloyd: 当然。[p/]一切听您吩咐，陛下。

original: You raise an eyebrow at the prince.[p/] It appears that he didn't come here [i]just[/i] to help you.
translation: 你朝王子挑了挑眉。[p/]看来他来这儿不<u>只</u>是为了帮你。

original: But you suppose that you've gotten all of the information you need out of von Sanctus.
translation: 但你觉得已经从冯·桑克图斯那儿得到所需的所有信息了。

original: It's time to move on to the next lead.
translation: 是时候追寻下一个线索了。

original: CAria: *sigh*[p/] That was embarrassing.
translation: CAria: *叹气* [p/]这有点尴尬了。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] That was a bit too close for comfort.
translation: Tyrion: 是呀……[p/]那有点太惊险了。

original: CAria: Well,[p/] at least no one saw through our disguises.
translation: CAria: 嗯，[p/]至少没人看穿我们的伪装。

original: Aria: Ah, are you an attendant here?
translation: Aria: 啊，你是这儿的仆人吗？

original: Aria: Please notify Lord von Sanctus that I-
translation: Aria: 请告知冯·桑克图斯勋爵，我——

original: The real Aria Steelwind walks through the front door of the manor, just as you are about to exit.
translation: 真正的阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德走进庄园的前门，而你正要出去。

original: She immediately stops in her tracks upon meeting her doppelganger.
translation: 她一看到自己的替身就立刻停下脚步。

original: CAria: Uh...
translation: CAria: 呃……

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: [b]Aburio[/b].
translation: Aria: [b]Aburio[/b].

original: With one spell,[p/] Steelwind dispels the illusions over you and Celeste.
translation: 斯蒂尔文德女士念了个咒语，[p/]就消除了你和塞莱斯特身上的幻象。

original: Upon seeing who you really are,[p/] she lets out an irritated sigh.
translation: 看到你们的真实身份后，[p/]她不耐烦地叹了口气。

original: Aria: ...Is impersonating the Steelwinds some kind of hobby for you, Ms. McCoy?
translation: Aria: ……你的爱好是假冒斯蒂尔文德家的人吗，麦考伊女士？

original: She looks really angry this time...
translation: 这一次她看起来真的很生气……

original: Celeste: N-[p/][s/]no![p/][s/] There was a [i]really[/i] good reason for us doing this!
translation: Celeste: 不、[p/][s/]不是的！[p/][s/]我们这么做是有<u>很</u>重要的原因的！

original: Aria: Let me guess.[p/] You wanted to interrogate von Sanctus without him knowing who you really were.
translation: Aria: 让我猜猜，[p/]你想在不暴露真实身份的情况下审问冯·桑克图斯。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: ...No?
translation: Celeste: ……不是的？

original: Aria: Lying about your name is one matter.[p/] But impersonating a noble using magic is a serious crime.
translation: Aria: 隐瞒自己的名字是一回事，[p/]但用魔法假冒贵族是重罪。

original: Celeste: Uh...[p/] Tyrion?[p/] Help, please?
translation: Celeste: 呃……[p/]提利昂？[p/]能帮帮我吗？

original: ...Are you seriously going to have to defend her in court again?
translation: ……你真得再在法庭上为她辩护吗？

original: You quickly try to think of a way to diffuse this situation...
translation: 你绞尽脑汁，想找个办法化解这场面……

original: Aster: Ah.[p/] Sorry for the wait, you two.[p/] I had to discuss-
translation: Aster: 啊，[p/]很抱歉让你们两位等这么久。[p/]我得讨论——

original: Aster: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] Um, Lady Steelwind?
translation: Aster: 噢、[p/]噢……[p/]呃，斯蒂尔文德女士？

original: Great...[p/] According to Aster,[p/] Steelwind despises him.
translation: 真棒……[p/]据阿斯特所说，[p/]斯蒂尔文德看不起他。

original: Knowing that [i]he[/i] was a part of this will just make things worse...
translation: 知道<u>他</u>参与其中只会让事情更糟……

original: Aria: Y-[p/]Y[p/]-Y[p/]-Y[p/][s/]-Your Majesty?! [mind="Why is he here?!"/]
translation: Aria: 殿、[p/]殿、[p/]殿、[p/]殿、[p/]殿下？！[mind="他怎么在这儿？！"/]

original: Celeste: ...?
translation: Celeste: ……？

original: ...What?
translation: ……什么？

original: Aster: O-[p/]Oh,[p/] I see you've dispelled their disguises...
translation: Aster: 噢、[p/]噢，[p/]我看到你消除了他们的伪装……

original: Aria: Y-[p/]You knew about this?!
translation: Aria: 你、[p/]你知道这回事？！

original: Aster steps between you and Steelwind.[p/] It seems that he's trying to calm her down.
translation: 阿斯特站在你和斯蒂尔文德女士中间，[p/]似乎想让她冷静下来。

original: For better or for worse,[p/] her attention is firmly focused on him.
translation: 不管怎样，[p/]她的注意力完全集中在他身上。

original: Aster: I'm terribly sorry...[p/] I didn't mean to disrespect you.
translation: Aster: 真对不起……[p/]我没想不尊重你。

original: Aria: N-[p/]No...[p/] That's not why I-
translation: Aria: 不、[p/]不是……[p/]我不是因为这——

original: Aria: O-[p/]Oh, I-[p/]I... [mind="He's really close..."/]
translation: Aria: 噢、[p/]噢，我、[p/]我……[mind="他离我太近了……"/]

original: Aster: They pulled this ruse under my orders.
translation: Aster: 这是奉我的命令干的。

original: Aster: Could you please look the other way,[p/] just this once?
translation: Aster: 就这一次，[p/]你能不能睁一只眼闭一只眼？

original: Aria: Um...
translation: Aria: 呃……

original: Aria: O-[p/]Okay...
translation: Aria: 好、[p/]好的……

original: Aster: Thank you, Lady Steelwind.[p/] I won't forget this.
translation: Aster: 谢谢你，斯蒂尔文德女士，[p/]我不会忘的。

original: Aria: Ah...! [mind="dsfhkjsadlkfsjfdlksghdlkjsahfjsa"/]
translation: Aria: 啊……！ [mind="dsfhkjsadlkfsjfdlksghdlkjsahfjsa"/]

original: Aria: I...[p/] need to go.
translation: Aria: 我……[p/]得走了。

original: Celeste: Well...[p/] [i]That[/i] was certainly something.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]<u>这</u>真的有点东西。

original: Aster: I'm sorry you two had to see that.
translation: Aster: 很抱歉让你们俩看见了这一幕。

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Aster: It's as I said before.[p/] She absolutely detests me.
translation: Aster: 就像我之前说的那样，[p/]她十分讨厌我。

original: Aster: You saw it, didn't you?[p/] She could barely look me in the eye...
translation: Aster: 你看到了，对吧？[p/]她都不愿意正眼看我……

original: Celeste: ...Oh my god.
translation: Celeste: ……老天爷。

original: Tyrion: ...In any case,[p/] we're starting to run out of time.[p/] We should head back to the refinery.
translation: Tyrion: ……总之，[p/]我们要没时间了。[p/]我们得赶回精炼厂。

original: Celeste: But we still don't know where the metal shard came from.
translation: Celeste: 但我们还是不知道金属碎片的来源。

original: Tyrion: From what von Sanctus told us,[p/] I don't think we [i]can[/i] find out exactly where it came from.
translation: Tyrion: 据冯·桑克图斯跟我们说的，[p/]我不觉得<u>能够</u>准确查出它的来源。

original: Tyrion: If each of von Sanctus' products has that crest,[p/] it could be any number of things.
translation: Tyrion: 如果冯·桑克图斯的产品上都有那个纹章，[p/]那它可能是很多种物品。

original: Tyrion: But hopefully,[p/] Dracogen can help us narrow that list down.
translation: Tyrion: 但希望德拉科根能帮我们缩小范围。

original: Tyrion: If it [i]did[/i] come from some kind of industrial tool,[p/] he might be able to check if any of the refinery's tools are missing.
translation: Tyrion: 如果碎片<u>确实</u>来自某种工业工具，[p/]也许德拉科根能查查精炼厂有没有工具丢了。

original: You just hope he can provide you with [i]some[/i] kind of lead.
translation: 你只希望他能提供<u>某种</u>线索。

original: Celeste: Well...[p/] We're here.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]我们到了。

original: You look around the manor and don't see anyone nearby.
translation: 你环顾庄园，没看到附近有其他人。

original: Aster: Hm...[p/] It looks like Lord Sanctus isn't home at the moment.
translation: Aster: 嗯……[p/]看来桑克图斯勋爵现在不在家。

original: Aster: Perhaps we should try looking somewhere else.
translation: Aster: 或许我们应该去其他地方找找。

original: Tyrion: ...Anyways,[p/] we saw von Sanctus heading back here.[p/] We should be able to speak with him soon.
translation: Tyrion: ……总之，[p/]我们看到冯·桑克图斯往这走，[p/]早晚能跟他说上话的。

original: Celeste: ...Wait,[p/] Tyrion.[p/] Isn't he going to recognize us?!
translation: Celeste: ……等等，[p/]提利昂，[p/]他不会认出我们来吗？！

original: Tyrion: ...We can't really avoid that.[p/] If we want to question him,[p/] we need to speak to him directly.
translation: Tyrion: ……我们确实没法避免这一点。[p/]如果想问他问题，[p/]我们就得直接跟他说。

original: Tyrion: But even a noble like him would have to act civilly with the crown prince present.
translation: Tyrion: 但即使是他这样的贵族，在王储殿下面前也得保持礼貌。

original: Celeste: You mean like how you "civilly" embarrassed [i]and[/i] insulted him a few days ago?
translation: Celeste: 和你前几天“礼貌地”让他出丑<u>而且</u>受到侮辱一样？

original: ...Right.[p/] You completely forgot about the chess tournament.
translation: ……对了。[p/]你完全忘了国际象棋比赛。

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] it's not as if we can hide our identities from him.
translation: Tyrion: 哎呀，[p/]我们又没法在他面前隐瞒身份。

original: Tyrion: I faced him in the chess tournament [i]and[/i] I'm Dracogen's attorney.
translation: Tyrion: 我在国际象棋比赛中跟他正面交锋过，<u>而且</u>我还是德拉科根的律师。

original: Tyrion: He knows what we look like.
translation: Tyrion: 他知道我们长什么样。

original: Celeste: ..."What we look like"?
translation: Celeste: ……“我们长什么样”？

original: Celeste: Wait![p/][s/] That's it!
translation: Celeste: 等等！[p/][s/]我知道了！

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: [i]Illusio[/i].
translation: Celeste: Illusio.

original: Tyrion: W-[p/]Wait...[p/] What are you-?
translation: Tyrion: 等、[p/]等等……[p/]你在说什——？

original: Aster: Wow...
translation: Aster: 哇……

original: Aster: That's quite impressive, Celeste.
translation: Aster: 这太厉害了，塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: Right?[p/] I've been practicing that one.
translation: Celeste: 对吧？[p/]我一直在练习。

original: Tyrion: What are you two talking about...?
translation: Tyrion: 你们俩在说什么……？

original: Aster: I think you should see for yourself.
translation: Aster: 你自己看看就明白了。

original: The prince gestures towards a nearby mirror in the hallway.
translation: 王子朝走廊里的一面镜子指了指。

original: You reluctantly approach it.[p/] Just what exactly did Celeste do to you?
translation: 你很不情愿地走过去。[p/]塞莱斯特到底把你怎么了？

original: Tyrion: Wha-?!
translation: Tyrion: 什——？！

original: TRhys: Why do I look like Rhys Rudolf?!
translation: TRhys: 为什么我看起来像瑞斯·鲁道夫？！

original: Celeste: It looks great, right?!
translation: Celeste: 看起来很不错，对吧？！

original: Celeste: Eris taught that one to me.
translation: Celeste: 厄莉斯教了我这个魔法。

original: Tyrion: Do you honestly expect him to fall for this?
translation: Tyrion: 你真的觉得这种把戏就能骗到他吗？

original: Tyrion: He's probably a powerful mage.[p/][s/] He'll see right [i]through[/i] this.
translation: Tyrion: 他有可能是一位强大的法师，[p/][s/]他会直接<u>看破</u>这个伪装的。

original: Lloyd: Are you telling me that the crown prince is [i]here[/i]?!
translation: Lloyd: 你是说王储殿下在<u>这儿</u>？！

original: Lloyd: Why didn't you notify me sooner?!
translation: Lloyd: 你为什么不早点告诉我？！

original: You hear von Sanctus shouting at his attendant from down the hallway.[p/] He seems to be quickly heading this way.
translation: 你听到冯·桑克图斯在走廊那头冲他的仆人大喊，[p/]他似乎正朝这边快步走来。

original: Celeste: Uh oh.
translation: Celeste: 啊噢。

original: Aster: You might want to disguise yourself as well, Celeste.
translation: Aster: 你最好也伪装一下自己，塞莱斯特。

original: Tyrion: Don't encourage her![p/][s/] This is [i]extremely[/i] illegal!
translation: Tyrion: 不要鼓励她！[p/][s/]这是<u>极度</u>违法的！

original: Celeste: R-[p/]Right...[p/] U-[p/]Uh...
translation: Celeste: 好、[p/]好的……[p/]呃、[p/]呃……

original: Tyrion: Look.[p/] You should just dispel this ridiculous disguise and-.
translation: Tyrion: 听着，[p/]你还是赶紧解除这荒唐的伪装吧——

original: Aster: He's almost here.
translation: Aster: 他就要来了。

original: Celeste: Agh![p/] I can't think of anyone!
translation: Celeste: 啊！[p/]我想不出装成谁！

original: Lloyd: I'm terribly sorry for keeping Your Highness waiting.
translation: Lloyd: 真对不起让殿下久等了。

original: Celeste: [i]Illusio[/i]!
translation: Celeste: Illusio!

original: Lloyd: Hm...?[p/] What was that?
translation: Lloyd: 嗯……？[p/]那是什么？

original: Aster: W-[p/][s/]What are you talking about?
translation: Aster: 你、[p/][s/]你在说什么呢？

original: Lloyd: I could have sworn that I heard something.
translation: Lloyd: 我明明听到什么动静。

original: CAria: I didn't hear anything either.[p/] You must be imagining things.
translation: CAria: 我什么也没听到。[p/]肯定是你听错了。

original: Scaled Lord help us...[p/] Of all the people she could have chosen.
translation: 鳞甲领主帮帮我们吧……[p/]那么多人里她偏偏要选这个人。

original: ...At least she's able to mimic her voice well enough.
translation: ……至少她模仿她的声音还算像。

original: Lloyd: Oh, Lady Steelwind?[p/] I wasn't expecting you until much later.
translation: Lloyd: 噢，斯蒂尔文德女士？[p/]我以为你还要晚些才会到。

original: CAria: Well...[p/] I do not answer to you.[p/] I shall do as I shall please.
translation: CAria: 嗯……[p/]我不需要向你汇报，[p/]我想做什么就做什么。

original: Lloyd: Yes.[p/] I suppose you have a habit of doing that.
translation: Lloyd: 是。[p/]我想你确实有这个习惯。

original: Surprisingly,[p/] it doesn't look like he's seen through your disguises.
translation: 令人惊讶的是，[p/]他看起来并没有识破你们的伪装。

original: He must have other things on his mind if his guard is down like this.
translation: 他现在肯定心事重重，才会这么疏忽大意。

original: Aster: A-[p/]Anyways Lord von Sanctus,[p/] Pardon the abrupt intrusion.[p/] I came by to pay my respects.
translation: Aster: 总、[p/]总之，冯·桑克图斯勋爵，[p/]请原谅我突然到访。[p/]我来是想表示一下敬意。

original: Lloyd: I am honored by Your Majesty's presence.
translation: Lloyd: 承蒙陛下屈尊莅临，不胜荣幸。

original: Lloyd: ...Unfortunately,[p/] I am quite busy with administrative matters at the moment.
translation: Lloyd: ……很不巧，[p/]我现在正忙于处理行政事务。

original: Aster: Too busy to show hospitality to the heir to the throne?
translation: Aster: 忙得连王位继承人都不招待了？

original: Lloyd: O-[p/][s/]Oh,[p/][s/] I didn't-[p/][s/] I-[p/][s/]I wasn't-
translation: Lloyd: 噢、[p/][s/]噢，[p/][s/]我不是——[p/][s/]我、[p/][s/]我没有——

original: Lloyd: I-[p/]I suppose I have some time to speak with you.
translation: Lloyd: 我、[p/]我想我还是有些时间陪您说话的。

original: The conditions aren't ideal...[p/] But at least you have von Sanctus here with you.
translation: 情况不是很理想……[p/]不过至少有和冯·桑克图斯说话的机会。

original: You should let Prince Aster make small talk with him for a bit.
translation: 你应该让阿斯特王子先跟他寒暄一会儿。

original: After that,[p/] you can subtly bring up the von Sanctus crest that you found in the vat.
translation: 之后，[p/]你还可以提起在桶里发现的冯·桑克图斯家族纹章。

original: Celeste: Tyrion,[p/] do you need me to scan for magical traces?
translation: Celeste: 提利昂，[p/]你要我扫描魔法痕迹吗？

original: Tyrion: Well...[p/] There aren't any magical elements in this case.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]这个案件中没有多少魔法元素。

original: Tyrion: But I suppose it wouldn't hurt to check.
translation: Tyrion: 但我想检查一下也没关系。

original: Celeste: Alright.
translation: Celeste: 好。

original: Tyrion: Hm… It looks like the guard rails completely broke apart.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……看起来护栏完全断开了。

original: Tyrion: The rails are completely rusted too...
translation: Tyrion: 而且也完全生锈了……

original: Tyrion: Was Dracogen lying about properly maintaining the site?
translation: Tyrion: 德拉科根说妥善维护是不是在撒谎？

original: Tyrion: It's a vat of dangerous magical chemicals.
translation: Tyrion: 这是一桶危险的魔法化学品。

original: Tyrion: Supposedly,[p/] they're corrosive enough to dissolve anyone unfortunate enough to fall into it.
translation: Tyrion: 据说，[p/]那里面的腐蚀性物质足以溶解掉任何掉进去的倒霉鬼。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste is watching you carefully.
translation: 塞莱斯特正小心地看着你。

original: She can be a little overprotective at times.
translation: 有时她会有点保护过头了。

original: Celeste: There are traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic on these guard rails...
translation: Celeste: 这些护栏上有[b]形变术[/b]魔法的痕迹……

original: Tyrion: I'm still not sure what it means...
translation: Tyrion: 我还不知道这意味着什么……

original: Tyrion: But perhaps there's more to this "accident" than we initially thought.
translation: Tyrion: 但或许这个“事故”背后有我们一开始没料到的东西。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: ...What?!
translation: Celeste: ……什么？！

original: Tyrion: What's wrong?
translation: Tyrion: 怎么了？

original: Celeste: There are...[p/][s/] traces of [b]transmutation[/b] all over the guard rails!
translation: Celeste: 护栏上……[p/][s/]到处都是[b]形变术[/b]魔法的痕迹！

original: Tyrion: [b]Transmutation[/b]?! [p/]Do you see those traces anywhere else on the walkway?!
translation: Tyrion: [b]形变术[/b]？！[p/]你还在走道的其他地方发现了魔法痕迹吗？

original: Celeste: No...[p/] It's only this area.
translation: Celeste: 没有……[p/]只有这块区域有。

original: Celeste: There are traces of [b]evocation[/b] magic on the chemicals in these vats.
translation: Celeste: 桶里的化学品有[b]塑能术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: That makes sense.[p/] [b]Evocation[/b] is the school of magic for spells that create and disperse energy.
translation: Tyrion: 那说得通。[p/][b]塑能术[/b]是种创造和消散能量的魔法。

original: Tyrion: These chemicals probably induce some sort of magical reaction to create Arcane Crystals.
translation: Tyrion: 这些化学品大概可以引发某种魔法反应来制造奥术水晶。

original: Celeste: [b]Transmutation[/b] is the school of magic that changes the properties of physical objects.
translation: Celeste: [b]形变术[/b]是改变现实物体属性的魔法学派。

original: Celeste: Usually mages use [b]transmutation[/b] spells to strengthen and repair objects.
translation: Celeste: 法师通常使用[b]形变术[/b]来增强或修复物体。

original: Tyrion: Someone used a spell to change the physical properties of the guard rails.
translation: Tyrion: 有人用法术改变了护栏的物理性质。

original: Tyrion: Judging by the current state of the rails,[p/] we can only conclude one thing.
translation: Tyrion: 从护栏目前的状况来看，[p/]我们只能得到一个结论。

original: No...[p/] We found traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic on the walkway.
translation: 不……[p/]我们在走道发现了[b]形变术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: And [b]transmutation[/b] spells always change the physical properties of objects.
translation: 而且[b]形变术[/b]可以改变物体的物理性质。

original: The guard rails broke when Justin put his weight on them.
translation: 护栏是在贾斯汀压在上面时断掉的。

original: So, what did this [b]transmutation[/b] spell [i]do[/i] to the guard rails [i]before[/i] Justin fell?
translation: 所以，[b]形变术[/b]在贾斯汀掉下去<u>之前</u>对护栏<u>做</u>了什么呢？

original: Tyrion: Right.[p/] Someone used a [b]transmutation[/b] spell to weaken the guard rails.
translation: Tyrion: 是的。[p/]有人用[b]形变术[/b]弱化了护栏。

original: Tyrion: Afterwards,[p/] the guard rails were so weak that Justin accidentally broke them.
translation: Tyrion: 之后，[p/]护栏变得十分脆弱，贾斯汀不小心就弄断了。

original: Celeste: And only [i]these[/i] guard rails were weakened.
translation: Celeste: 而且只有<u>这些</u>护栏被弱化了。

original: Celeste: The sabotaged rails are right next to this vat of corrosive chemicals, too.
translation: Celeste: 被破坏的护栏就在这个装腐蚀性化学品的桶旁边。

original: Tyrion: There was a clear intention behind the actions of this unknown mage.
translation: Tyrion: 这个不明身份的法师这么做目的明确。

original: Tyrion: Judging by what happened,[p/] that intention can only be one thing.
translation: Tyrion: 从发生的事来看，[p/]目的只有一个。

original: No...[p/] [i]Only[/i] the guard rails in front of this vat were sabotaged.
translation: 不……[p/]<u>只有</u>这个桶前的护栏被破坏了。

original: The unknown mage who did this must have had a clear intention when doing this.
translation: 不明身份的法师这么做肯定是有明确意图的。

original: They were trying to make a specific series of events occur.
translation: 他想引发一系列特定的事件。

original: Tyrion: ...Whoever sabotaged the guard rail [i]wanted[/i] someone to fall into the vat.
translation: Tyrion: ……破坏护栏的人是<u>想</u>让某人掉进桶里。

original: Tyrion: Why else would they only target those specific guard rails?
translation: Tyrion: 不然他为什么只针对那些特定的护栏？

original: Celeste: But...[p/][s/] why?![p/][s/] Who would do this?!
translation: Celeste: 但是……[p/][s/]为什么？！[p/][s/]谁会这么做呢？！

original: You can feel your fist clenching tightly.
translation: 你能感觉到自己的拳头攥得紧紧的。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Someone committed murder using magic here...
translation: 有人在这儿用魔法犯了谋杀罪……

original: And whoever did this had the [i]gall[/i] to try to cover it up!
translation: 干这事的人还<u>厚颜无耻</u>地试图掩盖罪行！

original: Celeste: T-[p/]Tyrion...?
translation: Celeste: 提、[p/]提利昂……？

original: You won't forgive whoever did this...
translation: 不管是谁干的，你都不会放过他……

original: When you're through with them,[p/] you will make them feel a [i]fraction[/i] of the misery that your mother-
translation: 等你收拾他们的时候，[p/]你会让他们感受到母亲当时的痛苦——

original: Celeste: Tyrion!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂！

original: Tyrion: W-[p/]What...?
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/]什么……？

original: Celeste: Are you okay?
translation: Celeste: 你还好吗？

original: Tyrion: R-[p/]Right...[p/] Sorry...
translation: Tyrion: 是、[p/]是的……[p/]不好意思……

original: Tyrion: A-[p/]Anyways, [p/]if it weren't for your [b]Detect Magic[/b],[p/] everyone would have written this off as an accident.
translation: Tyrion: 总、[p/]总之，[p/]如果没有你的[b]法术探测[/b]，[p/]大家只会把这件事当成一场意外。

original: Tyrion: Magical traces are only detectable for forty-eight hours after a mage casts a spell.
translation: Tyrion: 只有在法师施法后的 48 小时内才能探测到魔法痕迹。

original: Tyrion: That means that whoever cast the [b]transmutation[/b] spell, did so recently.
translation: Tyrion: 这就意味着不管是谁用的[b]形变术[/b]，他都是最近才用的。

original: Celeste: R-[p/]Right...
translation: Celeste: 是、[p/]是的……

original: Tyrion: It's the broken guard rail.[p/] The entire case hinges on finding out when and how this railing broke.
translation: Tyrion: 是坏掉的护栏，[p/]整个案子的关键就在于查清护栏是什么时候、怎么坏的。

original: Tyrion: If Justin Waye didn't break the guard rail,[p/] then who did?
translation: Tyrion: 如果不是贾斯汀弄断的护栏，[p/]那会是谁干的？

original: Tyrion: If the liquid is so volatile,[p/] how were you able to take things [i]out[/i] of the vat?
translation: Tyrion: 如果这种液体腐蚀性那么强，[p/]你怎么从桶里把东西拿<u>出来</u>呢？

original: Aster: Oh,[p/] the liquid isn't volatile [i]anymore[/i].
translation: Aster: 噢，[p/]液体已经<u>没有</u>腐蚀性了。

original: Aster: When the harbourmaster and I reported what we saw,[p/] the workers poured some sort of alchemical solution into the vat.
translation: Aster: 港务长和我报告我们看到的事情时，[p/]工人们往桶里倒了一种炼金溶液。

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] According to them,[p/] that solution neutralized the [b]evocation[/b] magic in those chemicals.
translation: Orym: 是的。[p/]据他们说，[p/]那种溶液中和了那些化学品中的[b]塑能术[/b]魔法。

original: Orym: From what I hear,[p/] the magical liquid in these vats is usually blue.
translation: Orym: 我听说，[p/]这些桶里的魔法液体通常是蓝色的。

original: Orym: The solution that they poured in turned it green.
translation: Orym: 他们倒进去的溶液把它变成了绿色。

original: Aster: Yes.[p/] Unfortunately,[p/] it was too late.
translation: Aster: 是的。[p/]不幸的是，[p/]已经太晚了。

original: Aster: By the time they'd neutralized the liquid,[p/] Justin's body had already mostly dissolved.
translation: Aster: 等他们中和了液体，[p/]贾斯汀的身体已经基本上溶解了。

original: Orym: And if they hadn't neutralized it so quickly,[p/] we probably wouldn’t have found [i]anything[/i] from the victim.
translation: Orym: 要不是他们中和得这么快，[p/]我们可能连受害者的<u>任何残留</u>都找不到了。

original: Celeste: The traces of [b]transmutation[/b] are still here.
translation: Celeste: [b]形变术[/b]魔法的痕迹还在这里。

original: Tyrion: It's been a day since the accident...
translation: Tyrion: 事故已经过去一天了……

original: Tyrion: If these traces were left two days ago,[p/] these traces [i]should[/i] disappear by tomorrow.
translation: Tyrion: 如果这些痕迹是两天前留下的，[p/]那这些痕迹明天<u>应该</u>就消失了。

original: Celeste: Right...[p/] Magical traces are only detectable for 48 hours after a spell is cast.
translation: Celeste: 是的……[p/]只有在施法后的 48 小时内才能探测到魔法痕迹。

original: Celeste: There are traces of [b]evocation[/b] magic on the chemicals in these vats.
translation: Celeste: 桶里的化学品有[b]塑能术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: That makes sense.[p/] [b]Evocation[/b] is the school of magic for spells that create and disperse energy.
translation: Tyrion: 那说得通。[p/][b]塑能术[/b]是种创造和消散能量的魔法。

original: Tyrion: These chemicals probably induce some sort of magical reaction to create Arcane Crystals.
translation: Tyrion: 这些化学品大概可以引发某种魔法反应来制造奥术水晶。

original: Tyrion: We already took a look at the metallic shards.
translation: Tyrion: 我们已经看过金属碎片了。

original: Tyrion: And we found one shard with the von Sanctus crest on it.
translation: Tyrion: 我们在其中一块上发现了冯·桑克图斯家族的纹章。

original: Tyrion: We'll probably have to look elsewhere if we want to find out where it came from.
translation: Tyrion: 如果想查出它的来源，我们可能得另寻他法了。

original: Tyrion: Commander White.[p/] You mentioned that you found several metallic shards in the vat.
translation: Tyrion: 怀特指挥官，[p/]你说裁判所在桶里发现了几片金属碎片。

original: Tyrion: Do you mind if we take a look at them?
translation: Tyrion: 我们能看看吗？

original: Orym: Sure.[p/] Just don't get any bright ideas about taking anything.
translation: Orym: 可以。[p/]只是别打歪主意要拿走其中一块。

original: Orym: ...You'll also want to avoid touching them with your bare hands.
translation: Orym: ……你最好也别直接用手碰。

original: Orym: The liquid is neutralized...[p/] But it definitely ain't good for your skin.
translation: Orym: 虽然液体已经中和了……[p/]但对你的皮肤也绝对没有好处。

original: The commander motions to one of the Inquisition knights.
translation: 指挥官向裁判所的一名骑士示意。

original: After a few moments,[p/] he brings back a large barrel filled with metallic shards.
translation: 过了一会儿，[p/]他推回一个装满金属碎片的大桶。

original: Celeste: What?[p/][s/] There were [i]that[/i] many?!
translation: Celeste: 什么？[p/][s/]竟然有<u>那么</u>多？

original: What could have possibly fallen into the vat?
translation: 到底什么东西掉进桶里了呢？

original: Tyrion: Well...[p/] I guess we should get started.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]我想我们该开始了。

original: Celeste: Ugh...
translation: Celeste: 唉……

original: You spend some time closely inspecting the metallic shards with Celeste.
translation: 你跟塞莱斯特花了一些时间仔细检查那些金属碎片。

original: The shards are only the size of small rocks.[p/] And it's difficult to find any discerning features.
translation: 碎片只有小石头那么大，[p/]也很难找到什么明显的特征。

original: Tyrion: ...Any luck on your end?
translation: Tyrion: ……你那边有收获吗？

original: Celeste: No...[p/] I haven't found-...
translation: Celeste: 不……[p/]我没有找到——

original: Celeste: ...!
translation: Celeste: ……！

original: Tyrion: Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特？

original: Celeste: ...I think I found something!
translation: Celeste: ……我好像找到了什么！

original: Celeste: I'm...[p/] not exactly sure what it is though...
translation: Celeste: 我……[p/]还不确定是什么……

original: Celeste pulls out a metallic shard with some sort of engraving on it.
translation: 塞莱斯特拿出一片上面有某种雕刻的金属碎片。

original: Unlike the other shards,[p/] this one looks far less damaged.
translation: 跟其他碎片不同，[p/]这片看起来损坏程度轻得多。

original: The engraving on it looks like some sort of crest.
translation: 上面的雕刻看起来像某种纹章。

original: Aster: ...That's the crest of House von Sanctus!
translation: Aster: ……那是冯·桑克图斯家的纹章！

original: Celeste: Isn't he the noble that's charging Dracogen?
translation: Celeste: 他不就是那位指控德拉科根的贵族吗？

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] I doubt that [i]Lord von Sanctus[/i] was the second victim...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯，[p/]我不觉得<u>冯·桑克图斯勋爵</u>会是第二位受害者……

original: Tyrion: Aster.[p/] Do you know who would have a house emblem like this?
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特，[p/]你知道什么样的贵族会有这种纹章吗？

original: Aster: Hm...[p/] Normally,[p/] only the lord's retainers would have the emblems of his house.
translation: Aster: 嗯……[p/]一般来说，[p/]只有领主的家臣才有他家的纹章。

original: Tyrion: Well, I doubt that Justin was the one who had this in his possession...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯，我怀疑这玩意儿不是贾斯汀的……

original: Celeste: Do you think one of von Sanctus's retainers fell into the vat that night?
translation: Celeste: 你觉得冯·桑克图斯的某个家臣在那天晚上掉进桶里了吗？

original: Tyrion: It's definitely possible...[p/] But if that [i]did[/i] happen,[p/] why haven't we heard about it?
translation: Tyrion: 很有可能……[p/]但如果<u>真的</u>发生了，[p/]为什么我们没听说呢？

original: Aster: Lloyd von Sanctus [i]would[/i] have the resources to keep something like that out of the public eye.
translation: Aster: 洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯<u>有</u>本事把这种事捂得严严实实的。

original: Tyrion: The only way to know for sure would be to ask him ourselves...
translation: Tyrion: 要确定这一点，唯一的办法就是我们亲自问他……

original: Tyrion: But even if we [i]could[/i] talk to him,[p/] he would never cooperate with us.
translation: Tyrion: 但就算我们<u>可以</u>问他，[p/]他也绝不会配合的。

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: You glance at the prince.
translation: 你看向王子。

original: Someone of his station would have no trouble meeting with Lord von Sanctus.
translation: 他这种身份的人见冯·桑克图斯勋爵毫无障碍。

original: An idea begins to form in your mind.
translation: 你脑海中开始形成一个想法。

original: Tyrion: Unless...
translation: Tyrion: 除非……

original: Aster: What is it, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Aster: 除非什么，卡斯伯特先生？

original: Tyrion: Aster,[p/] do you think you could help us interrogate Lord von Sanctus?
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特，[p/]你觉得你能帮我们审问冯·桑克图斯勋爵吗？

original: Aster: Really?![p/][s/] You need [i]my[/i] help?!
translation: Aster: 真的吗？！[p/][s/]你需要<u>我的</u>帮助？

original: Tyrion: ...In this instance,[p/] it'd be very difficult to speak to him by ourselves.
translation: Tyrion: ……在这种情况下，[p/]我们和他谈还是很有难度的。

original: Tyrion: But as the crown prince,[p/] he'd be much more inclined to speak with you.
translation: Tyrion: 但是你身为王储殿下，[p/]他会更愿意跟你交谈。

original: Aster: Of course![p/][s/] I'd be happy to help!
translation: Aster: 当然可以！[p/][s/]我很乐意帮忙！

original: You might be overplaying your hand by utilizing Aster this way.
translation: 你这样利用阿斯特，或许有点操之过急。

original: You're still wary of the prince.[p/] Especially since he was one of the few mages at the scene.
translation: 你对王子仍心存戒备，[p/]尤其考虑到他也是现场为数不多的法师之一。

original: Celeste: Hm...[p/] Will this really work, though...?
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]但是这真的有用吗……？

original: Tyrion: It's not ideal...[p/] But it's the only lead we have so far.
translation: Tyrion: 这不是最好的办法……[p/]但这是我们目前唯一的线索。

original: But it still bothers you.
translation: 但这还是困扰着你。

original: Why haven't you found any bone matter from a second person...?
translation: 你为什么没找到第二个受害者的碎骨呢……？

original: Maybe you're overthinking it.
translation: 或许只是你想多了。

original: You should pursue every lead and see where it takes you.
translation: 你应该追寻每一条线索，看看会通向哪里。

original: ...And to do that,[p/] you need to find out where Lord von Sanctus is.
translation: ……要这么做，[p/]你需要先找出冯·桑克图斯勋爵在哪儿。

original: Tyrion: I'm surprised that the Inquisition is even here.
translation: Tyrion: 就连裁判所也在这儿让我很惊讶。

original: Tyrion: I thought you were all busy investigating Aster's missing ship.
translation: Tyrion: 我以为你们都忙于调查阿斯特那艘失踪的船。

original: Orym: W-[p/]Wait...[p/][s/] You know about that?!
translation: Orym: 等、[p/]等等……[p/][s/]你知道这件事？！

original: The commander glances nervously at Aster.
translation: 指挥官紧张地看着阿斯特。

original: Orym: W-[p/]We [i]wanted[/i] to put more of our people there.
translation: Orym: 我、[p/]我们<u>也想</u>在那多安排一些人。

original: Orym: B-[p/]but Lady Steelwind [i]insisted[/i] that we focus on the Dracogen case.
translation: Orym: 但、[p/]但是斯蒂尔文德女士<u>坚持</u>认为应该专注于德拉科根的案件。

original: Aster: As you should.
translation: Aster: 你们是应该这么做。

original: Aster: I would much rather have you find justice for Justin Waye.
translation: Aster: 我更希望你们能为贾斯汀·维耶讨回公道。

original: Aster: That's far more important than looking for some musty old ship.
translation: Aster: 比去找一艘破旧的船可重要得多。

original: Orym: R-[p/]Right... [mind="Is this kid for real...?" /]
translation: Orym: 好、[p/]好的…… [mind="这个孩子是认真的吗……？" /]

original: Tyrion: Have you discovered anything about the magical traces here?
translation: Tyrion: 你们在这里发现了任何魔法痕迹吗？

original: Orym: We [i]did[/i] take a look at it.[p/] And it's definitely suspicious.
translation: Orym: 我们<u>确实</u>发现了。[p/]而且这绝对很可疑。

original: Orym: The only rails with magical traces on them are these.
translation: Orym: 只有这些护栏上有魔法痕迹。

original: Orym: And the fact that we can still see 'em means that they were left within the last 48 hours.
translation: Orym: 而且我们还能看到这些痕迹，说明它们是 48 小时内留下的。

original: Orym: It's looking pretty likely that someone used [b]transmutation[/b] on these rails that night.
translation: Orym: 看起来很可能是有人在那天晚上对这些护栏施了[b]形变术[/b]魔法。

original: Tyrion: It still doesn't make sense, though...
translation: Tyrion: 但是这样还是说不通……

original: Tyrion: Why would someone weaken [i]these[/i] rails specifically?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么会有人特意弱化<u>这些</u>护栏呢？

original: Orym: I have no idea.[p/] I'm just as confused as you are.
translation: Orym: 我不知道。[p/]我跟你一样摸不着头脑。

original: Orym: If this is really foul play,[p/] then someone [i]knew[/i] that Justin or some other person would be in this exact place.
translation: Orym: 如果这真的是蓄意犯罪，[p/]就说明有人<u>知道</u>贾斯汀或其他人会在这个位置。

original: Tyrion: Has the Inquisition found any evidence to prove my theory?
translation: Tyrion: 裁判所有找到任何能证明我的理论的证据吗？

original: Orym: You mean about a [i]second[/i] person falling into the vat?
translation: Orym: 你是说跟<u>第二个</u>掉入桶里的人相关的理论？

original: Orym: Sorry, kid.[p/] But it ain't that simple.
translation: Orym: 不好意思，孩子，[p/]事情没有那么简单。

original: Orym: The body of that Justin fella sort of...[p/] dissolved.
translation: Orym: 那个叫贾斯汀的人基本……[p/]溶解了。

original: Aster: That's quite...[p/] gruesome.
translation: Aster: 这可真够……[p/]惨的。

original: Orym: If [i]another[/i] person had fallen in,[p/] their body would have dissolved too.
translation: Orym: 如果<u>另一个人</u>掉进去，[p/]他的身体也会溶解。

original: Orym: But we could only find some bone fragments,[p/] blood,[p/] and a lot of metallic shards.
translation: Orym: 但我们只找到一些碎骨、[p/]血、[p/]和很多金属碎片。

original: Tyrion: Have you been able to use [b]divination[/b] magic to identify the bone fragments?
translation: Tyrion: 你用[b]占卜术[/b]魔法查出那些碎骨是谁的了吗？

original: Orym: Yep.[p/] The ones we found [i]all[/i] belonged to Justin Waye.
translation: Orym: 用了。[p/]我们找到的<u>全都</u>是贾斯汀·维耶的。

original: Orym: No signs of bones from another person...
translation: Orym: 没有任何来自其他人的碎骨……

original: Tyrion: There wasn't any evidence of another person falling in...?
translation: Tyrion: 就没有任何证据证明另一个人掉进去了吗……？

original: Could your theory have been incorrect, then?
translation: 那你的理论还会是正确的吗？

original: Tyrion: Are you sure that you and Morrison saw a person fall into the vat, Aster?
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特，你确定你和莫里森看见有个人掉进桶里了吗？

original: Aster: I definitely saw [i]someone[/i] fall off of the walkway and break the guard rails...
translation: Aster: 我确实看到<u>有人</u>从走道上掉下去，弄坏了护栏……

original: Aster: Although,[p/] thinking back on it,[p/] I didn't recognize [i]who[/i] exactly that person was.
translation: Aster: 不过，[p/]现在回想起来，[p/]我没认出那个人到底是<u>谁</u>。

original: Aster: The harbourmaster and I were pretty far away.[p/] And it wasn't well-lit.
translation: Aster: 我和港务长都离那挺远，[p/]而且光线不好。

original: Celeste: Do you think the second victim's body [i]fully[/i] dissolved?
translation: Celeste: 你认为第二位受害者的尸体已经<u>完全</u>溶解了吗？

original: Celeste: That might explain why we can't find any bone matter from them.
translation: Celeste: 那就能解释为什么我们找不到任何他的骨头。

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] If my theory is correct,[p/] the second victim fell in minutes [i]after[/i] Justin fell.
translation: Tyrion: 不对……[p/]如果我的理论是正确的话，[p/]第二个受害者是在贾斯汀掉下去几分钟<u>后</u>掉进去的。

original: Tyrion: It wouldn't make sense if that person's body fully dissolved before Justin's.
translation: Tyrion: 那个人的尸体比贾斯汀的先完全溶解可说不通。

original: But why can't you find any bone matter of this second person?
translation: 但你为什么找不到第二个人的碎骨呢？

original: Celeste: Either way,[p/] Dracogen might want to hear about this.
translation: Celeste: 总之，[p/]德拉科根可能会想听听这件事。

original: Tyrion: If the liquid is so volatile,[p/] how were you able to take things [i]out[/i] of the vat?
translation: Tyrion: 如果这种液体腐蚀性那么强，[p/]你怎么从桶里把东西拿<u>出来</u>呢？

original: Aster: Oh,[p/] the liquid isn't volatile [i]anymore[/i].
translation: Aster: 噢，[p/]液体已经<u>没有</u>腐蚀性了。

original: Aster: When the harbourmaster and I reported what we saw,[p/] the workers poured some sort of alchemical solution into the vat.
translation: Aster: 港务长和我报告我们看到的事情时，[p/]工人们往桶里倒了一种炼金溶液。

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] According to them,[p/] that solution neutralized the [b]evocation[/b] magic in those chemicals.
translation: Orym: 是的。[p/]据他们说，[p/]那种溶液中和了那些化学品中的[b]塑能术[/b]魔法。

original: Orym: From what I hear,[p/] the magical liquid in these vats is usually blue.
translation: Orym: 我听说，[p/]这些桶里的魔法液体通常是蓝色的。

original: Orym: The solution that they poured in turned it green.
translation: Orym: 他们倒进去的溶液把它变成了绿色。

original: Aster: Yes.[p/] Unfortunately,[p/] it was too late.
translation: Aster: 是的。[p/]不幸的是，[p/]已经太晚了。

original: Aster: By the time they'd neutralized the liquid,[p/] Justin's body had already mostly dissolved.
translation: Aster: 等他们中和了液体，[p/]贾斯汀的身体已经基本上溶解了。

original: Orym: And if they hadn't neutralized it so quickly,[p/] we probably wouldn’t have found [i]anything[/i] from the victim.
translation: Orym: 要不是他们中和得这么快，[p/]我们可能连受害者的<u>任何残留</u>都找不到了。

original: Tyrion: I still can't believe that you've been the crown prince this entire time...
translation: Tyrion: 我还是难以相信你是王储殿下……

original: Aster: I wasn't [i]trying[/i] to deceive you.
translation: Aster: 我并没有<u>试图</u>欺骗你。

original: Aster: I was just worried that you might treat me differently if you knew the truth.
translation: Aster: 我只是担心你知道真相后会改变态度。

original: Orym: O-[p/]Oh,[p/] right.
translation: Orym: 噢、[p/]噢，[p/]对了。

original: Orym: ...Should I call Steelwind over here for you?
translation: Orym: ……需要我为你把斯蒂尔文德喊来吗？

original: Orym: She'll probably want to see you.
translation: Orym: 她可能想见你。

original: Aster: No...[p/] I think it would be best if you didn't.
translation: Aster: 不……[p/]我觉得不喊会更好。

original: Celeste: ...Oh, I remember now!
translation: Celeste: ……噢，我想起来了！

original: Celeste: If you're the crown prince,[p/] that makes Prosecutor Steelwind your fiancée.
translation: Celeste: 如果你是王储，[p/]那斯蒂尔文德检察官就是你的未婚妻。

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Right,[p/] Lady Frega mentioned that during the Nightgrave case!
translation: 对的，[p/]弗雷加女士在奈特格雷夫一案中提到过这回事。

original: [i]That's[/i] why the name "Aster" sounded so familiar.
translation: <u>这就是</u>为什么“阿斯特”这个名字听起来这么耳熟。

original: You saw it in her thoughts.
translation: 你在她的想法中看到了。

original: Aster: Ugh...[p/] That Miriam...
translation: Aster: 呃啊……[p/]这个米莉亚姆……

original: Aster: She's caused me so much trouble by publicly revealing my marriage to Lady Steelwind.
translation: Aster: 她把我和斯蒂尔文德小姐的婚约公之于众，给我造成了不少麻烦。

original: Aster: I had hoped to keep it a secret for much longer.
translation: Aster: 我本想多保密一会儿的。

original: Tyrion: Where [i]is[/i] Prosecutor Steelwind, anyways?
translation: Tyrion: 总之，斯蒂尔文德检察官<u>在</u>哪里？

original: Tyrion: She always investigates these crime scenes herself.
translation: Tyrion: 她一直都会亲自调查犯罪现场。

original: Orym: Ah,[p/] she said she wanted to investigate the disappearing ship personally.
translation: Orym: 啊，[p/]她说想去调查失踪的船只。

original: Orym: She seems really hellbent on finding the people responsible.
translation: Orym: 她看起来下了决心要找到罪魁祸首。

original: Orym: They [i]did[/i] attempt to kidnap the crown prince, after all.
translation: Orym: 毕竟他们<u>确实</u>曾尝试绑架王储殿下。

original: Celeste: Aw,[p/] she must really care about you, Aster.
translation: Celeste: 哇哦，[p/]阿斯特，她真的很在乎你。

original: Aster: No...[p/] I highly doubt that.
translation: Aster: 不……[p/]我真的不这么觉得。

original: Celeste: What?
translation: Celeste: 啥？

original: Aster: ...Our marriage was arranged by our parents.
translation: Aster: ……我们的婚姻是被长辈一手安排的。

original: Aster: She had no say in the matter,[p/] and I know that she only tolerates me for the good of our kingdom.
translation: Aster: 她没有决定权，[p/]我知道她只是为了王国在容忍我。

original: Celeste: I-[p/]I'm sure she still cares about you.
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/]我敢肯定她还是在乎你的。

original: Aster: No.[p/] I can tell by the way she behaves around me.
translation: Aster: 不。[p/]从她在我身边的样子就能看出来。

original: Aster: Her hands quiver with rage,[p/] and she can't even bear to look at me when I speak to her...
translation: Aster: 她的双手因愤怒而颤抖，[p/]甚至不愿意在我说话的时候正眼看我……

original: Orym: Damn...[p/] I can't believe she even treats the [i]crown prince[/i] like that.
translation: Orym: 天啊……[p/]真不敢相信她会这么对待<u>王储殿下</u>。

original: Aster: She may be my fiancée...[p/] But our marriage is purely political.
translation: Aster: 虽然她是我的未婚妻……[p/]但我们只是政治联姻关系。

original: Aster: She endures so much because of her name...
translation: Aster: 她因为自己的姓氏承受了太多……

original: Orym: I guess you aristocrats have your own share of problems...
translation: Orym: 看来你们贵族也有自己的烦恼……

original: Orym: I never expected to see [i]you[/i] here.
translation: Orym: 我可没想过会在这儿见到<u>你</u>。

original: Orym: Don't you only work on homicide cases?
translation: Orym: 你不是专门接谋杀案吗？

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] It's a bit of a long story.
translation: Tyrion: 哎……[p/]这就说来话长了。

original: Tyrion: I'm doing this as a favor to a friend.
translation: Tyrion: 我是在给朋友帮忙。

original: Orym: Huh...[p/] I guess connections really [i]are[/i] everything in the world of commerce.
translation: Orym: 嗬……[p/]看来人际关系真的在哪儿都<u>很重要</u>。

original: Orym: So you've got Tymora payrolling you.[p/] Eh,[p/] mage girl?
translation: Orym: 所以泰摩拉现在也给你付工资啦？[p/]法师小姑娘？

original: Orym: I saw your record,[p/] you were working pretty high-profile shit in the Eastern Kingdoms.
translation: Orym: 我看过你的记录了，[p/]你在东方古国干的事可是惊天动地啊。

original: Orym: Isn't working for a law firm technically a downgrade for you?
translation: Orym: 给法律事务所打工是不是有点委屈你的本领了？

original: Celeste: Not really.[p/] Ruby pays me [i]really[/i] well.
translation: Celeste: 没有啦。[p/]鲁比给的薪酬<u>相当</u>高。

original: Celeste: I guess she has a lot of gold or something.
translation: Celeste: 看来她事业路上赚得盆满钵满。

original: Orym: Hmph...[p/] Of course, she does.
translation: Orym: 哼……[p/]她当然有钱。

original: Celeste: Anyways,[p/] this knucklehead wouldn't last a day without me guarding him.
translation: Celeste: 总之，[p/]没我保护的话，这个笨蛋活不过一天。

original: Tyrion: Hey...
translation: Tyrion: 喂……

original: She's not wrong, though.
translation: 虽然她说得也没错。

original: Orym: If [i]you're[/i] here, does that mean...?
translation: Orym: 如果<u>你</u>在这里，岂不是意味着……？

original: Tyrion: Don't worry.[p/] Ms. Tymora's not here.
translation: Tyrion: 别担心。[p/]泰摩拉女士没来。

original: Orym: Ugh...[p/] Good.
translation: Orym: 呃啊……[p/]很好。

original: Orym: Can't stand the sight of that woman.
translation: Orym: 我见都不想见那个女人。

original: Tyrion:...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Orym: Ugh...[p/] Steelwind always micromanages the Inquisition.
translation: Orym: 唉……[p/]斯蒂尔文德对裁判所的管理算是“无微不至”。

original: Orym: But now she's just dumping all of her work on me.
translation: Orym: 但现在她却把所有活都甩给我干。

original: Orym: Honestly,[p/] I don't know which of the two is worse.
translation: Orym: 老实说，[p/]我都不知道哪种情况更差。

original: Being a subordinate of the prosecutor [i]does[/i] look like a stressful experience.
translation: 当斯蒂尔文德检察官的下属看起来<u>确实</u>压力不小。

original: Orym: I can't believe I have to work a case [i]directly[/i] for a noble.
translation: Orym: 不敢相信我要<u>直接</u>为贵族调查案件。

original: Orym: Dealing with their usual "requests" is bad enough.
translation: Orym: 他们平常的“要求”就够麻烦了。

original: Orym: Now I have to answer directly to Von Sanctus?
translation: Orym: 现在我还要直接与冯·桑克图斯交流？

original: Tyrion: He [i]may[/i] be the lord of this region,[p/] but isn't he also a business competitor?
translation: Tyrion: 他<u>或许</u>是这片区域的领主，[p/]但他同时不也是商业对手吗？

original: Tyrion: That [i]must[/i] be a conflict of interest.
translation: Tyrion: 这里面<u>肯定</u>有利益冲突。

original: Orym: Sure is.[p/] But you, of all people, should know how it is...
translation: Orym: 当然有。[p/]但是你最应该清楚是什么……

original: Tyrion: ...Do I have to worry about him interfering with the investigation?
translation: Tyrion: ……我需要担心他干涉调查吗？

original: Orym: I don't think so.
translation: Orym: 我觉得不用。

original: Orym: For better or for worse,[p/] Steelwind is really particular about not letting [i]anyone[/i] interfere with our work.
translation: Orym: 不论这一点是好是坏，[p/]斯蒂尔文德都绝对不会让<u>任何人</u>干涉我们的工作。

original: Orym: I'd [i]heard[/i] that the prince was exploring the town alone.
translation: Orym: 我<u>听说</u>王子在独自探索城镇。

original: Orym: ...But I never imagined that he was with [i]you two[/i] the entire time.
translation: Orym: ……但我可没想到他一直都和<u>你们两个</u>在一起。

original: Aster: My apologies.[p/] I'm aware of how uneasy the Kingsguard is about my actions.
translation: Aster: 我很抱歉。[p/]我知道国王卫队对我的行动感到非常不安。

original: Aster: But I wanted to explore the city without their presence.
translation: Aster: 但我不想探索城镇的时候还要被他们跟着。

original: ...Actually,[p/] they're probably keeping an eye on him from a distance.
translation: ……事实上，[p/]国王卫队很有可能在远处进行监视。

original: There isn't a chance that they'd let a prince wander the crowded city alone.
translation: 他们不可能会让一位王子独自在人员密集的城市里闲逛。

original: They're probably watching him right now.
translation: 就连现在，国王卫队可能都在看着王子。

original: Orym: I've seen some shit in my day...
translation: Orym: 我也算是见得多了……

original: Orym: But falling into a vat of acid...?[p/] I can't imagine much worse ways to go.
translation: Orym: 但掉进装满酸液的桶里……？[p/]我可想不出比这更糟的死法。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] It's disturbing when you think about it.
translation: Celeste: 是啊……[p/]光想想就让人难受。

original: That's all the more reason to get justice for his death.
translation: 所以你更得为他讨回公道。

original: Orym: Hmph...[p/] Magical traces in a damn [i]civil[/i] case.
translation: Orym: 嗯……[p/]就连<u>民事</u>案件里都有魔法痕迹。

original: Orym: You always know [i]exactly[/i] how to make my job harder.
translation: Orym: 你真是了解<u>怎么</u>让我要干的活变多啊。

original: Tyrion: It's your job to solve magical crimes, isn't it?
translation: Tyrion: 你的工作不就是解决涉及魔法的案件吗？

original: Tyrion: All I'm doing is bringing the truth to light.
translation: Tyrion: 我只是在努力让真相大白而已。

original: Orym: Yeah, yeah.
translation: Orym: 是，是。

original: Tyrion: Commander.[p/] Would you happen to know about a criminal named the Eyetaker?
translation: Tyrion: 指挥官。[p/]你知不知道一个叫夺眼者的罪犯？

original: Orym: ...You playing games with me or something, kid?
translation: Orym: ……你跟我玩什么游戏呢，小子？

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Orym: Well,[p/] I don't know nothing about no "Eyetaker".
translation: Orym: 哎，[p/]我没听说过什么“夺眼者”。

original: Tyrion: Okay...?
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……？

original: Tyrion: What do you think about [i]this[/i]?
translation: Tyrion: 你对<u>这个</u>有什么看法？

original: Orym: Uh...[p/] I don't know what you were expecting.
translation: Orym: 呃……[p/]我不知道你想听什么。

original: Orym: But there's not much to say about that.
translation: Orym: 但我没什么能说的。

original: It'd be best to try something else.
translation: 最好问问别的。

original: Orym: Oh,[p/] it's you two.[p/] And who's this-?
translation: Orym: 哦，[p/]是你们俩。[p/]这位是——？

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Orym: Wait...![p/][s/] T-[p/][s/]The hell?!
translation: Orym: 等下……！[p/][s/]什、[p/][s/]什么鬼？！

original: Aster: U-[p/]Um...[p/] Commander,[p/] please don't-
translation: Aster: 呃、[p/]呃……[p/]指挥官，[p/]请不要——

original: Orym: What the hell are [i]you[/i] two doing with the crown prince?!
translation: Orym: <u>你们</u>两个为什么会和王储殿下在一起？！

original: Celeste: ...What?!
translation: Celeste: ……什么？！

original: Aster: Ah...
translation: Aster: 唉……

original: Aster: It appears that my cover has been "blown",[p/] as they say.
translation: Aster: 看来我的伪装“穿帮”了。

original: Tyrion: D-[p/][s/]Did he just say that you're the "crown prince"?!
translation: Tyrion: 他、[p/][s/]他刚才说你是“王储殿下”？！

original: Aster: *sigh*
translation: Aster: *叹气*

original: Aster: Yes.[p/] My full name is Aster de Wyverngarde IV:[p/] heir to the throne of Wyverngarde.
translation: Aster: 是的，[p/]我的全名是阿斯特·维文加德四世，维文加德王座的继承人。

original: This entire time...[p/][s/] You've been speaking to the heir to the throne?!
translation: 你这段时间……[p/][s/]一直在和下一任国王交流？！

original: Aster: I was hoping that it wouldn't come to this.
translation: Aster: 我原本希望不会到这一步。

original: Orym: O-[p/][s/]Oh...[p/] S-[p/]Sorry, Your...[p/] um-[p/][s/] ...Majesty!
translation: Orym: 哦、[p/][s/]哦……[p/]抱、[p/]抱歉……[p/]呃、[p/][s/]王子殿下！

original: Aster: Please.[p/] None of that.
translation: Aster: 别这样。[p/]不用这么叫我。

original: Aster: I would much prefer if you all continued to call me "Aster".
translation: Aster: 我更希望你们都能继续叫我“阿斯特”。

original: Orym: N-[p/]No,[p/] I could never-
translation: Orym: 不、[p/]不，[p/]我不能——

original: You've never seen the commander this flustered before.
translation: 你从没见过指挥官这么慌乱的样子。

original: Tyrion: ...Why did you find the need to hide this from us?
translation: Tyrion: ……为什么你要对我们隐瞒这件事？

original: Aster: I...[p/] didn't want you to think less of me.
translation: Aster: 我……[p/]不想让你们看不起我。

original: Aster: I admire your work, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aster: 卡斯伯特先生，我钦佩你的工作。

original: Aster: Which is why I was afraid you wouldn't speak with me if you knew the truth.
translation: Aster: 所以我才怕万一知道真相，你就不会再和我说话。

original: In a way,[p/] he was correct to assume that...
translation: 某种程度上，[p/]他想得也没错……

original: As a member of the royal family,[p/] he represents [i]everything[/i] that you and Ms. Tymora are fighting against.
translation: 身为皇室成员，[p/]他代表了你和泰摩拉女士试图抗争的<u>一切</u>。

original: But...[p/] He [i]does[/i] look like a sincere and genuine person.
translation: 但……[p/]他看起来<u>确实</u>是个真诚的人。

original: At the very least,[p/] you haven't seen anything incriminating through the Eye of Horus.
translation: 退一万步说，[p/]荷鲁斯之眼还没有发现任何可疑的地方。

original: Anyways,[p/] this complicates things greatly.
translation: 总之，[p/]事情这下复杂起来了。

original: Aster is your primary suspect...[p/] So if he [i]did[/i] commit the murder,[p/] you would have to implicate a member of the royal family.
translation: 阿斯特是你的首要嫌疑人……[p/]如果<u>确实</u>是他犯下罪行，[p/]你就需要让一名皇室成员被定罪。

original: A nobleman is one thing...[p/] But would it even be possible to convict the Crown Prince...?
translation: 贵族是一回事……[p/]但王储真的可能会被定罪吗……？

original: :Well...[p/] No matter what,[p/] you won't stop seeking justice.
translation: :总之……[p/]不论如何，[p/]你都不会停止追求正义。

original: :It doesn't matter [i]who[/i] you're facing:[p/] be they man,[p/] king,[p/] or god.
translation: :不管是<u>谁</u>挡在你面前：人、[p/]王、[p/]亦或是神。

original: And princes aside,[p/] you came here to talk to the commander about his investigation.
translation: 先不管王子，[p/]你来这里是要找指挥官询问调查进展的。

original: Since Aster is accompanying you,[p/] he might be more inclined to share details with you.
translation: 既然有阿斯特陪着你，[p/]指挥官可能也更愿意分享详细情报。
