original: Mosourika: That day,[p/] I was looking for Justin in the freight area.[p/] But I couldn't find him.
translation: Mosourika: 那天，[p/]我在货运区找贾斯汀，[p/]但我找不到他。

original: Mosourika: I decided to look for him in the refinery's main building.
translation: Mosourika: 于是我决定去精炼厂的主楼找他。

original: Mosourika: There was some kind of magical door leading into it,[p/] but it was unlocked.
translation: Mosourika: 有一道通往大楼的魔法门，[p/]但它没有上锁。

original: Mosourika: Mr. Dracogen must have disabled the lock.[p/] No one else could have disabled it.
translation: Mosourika: 一定是德拉科根先生解除了锁，[p/]没有其他人能这么做。

original: Mosourika: Nothing really stopped me from entering the refinery building.
translation: Mosourika: 我进入精炼厂时确实没遇见什么阻碍。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Mosourika: Plenty of people could have disabled the locks.
translation: Mosourika: 很多人都可以解除门锁。

original: Mosourika: Maybe one of the employees got lazy and forcefully broke it.
translation: Mosourika: 可能员工之一犯懒了，用武力破坏了锁。

original: Mosourika: There was also that nobleman who was with Mr. Morrison.[p/] [i]He's[/i] a mage and he could have used magic to do it.
translation: Mosourika: 还有那位和莫里森先生一起的贵族，[p/]<u>他</u>是一名法师，可以利用魔法。

original: Mosourika: It could have also been one of the Maintenance Constructs.[p/] I saw one working on the machines.[p/] Maybe one of [i]them[/i] broke the lock.
translation: Mosourika: 也有可能是维护构造体。[p/]我曾看到它们在维护机器，[p/]也许是<u>它们</u>中的某一个破坏了锁。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Lloyd: It [i]is[/i] possible to order a Construct to complete a complex list of tasks.[p/] But doing so is ill-advised.
translation: Lloyd: <u>确实</u>有可能命令构造体去完成一系列复杂的任务。[p/]但这么做是不明智的。

original: Lloyd: I'm sure you observed this with the Nightgrave trial.[p/] Constructs are extremely prone to error when completing a long list of tasks.
translation: Lloyd: 我相信你在奈特格雷夫一案中也注意到了这一点。[p/]构造体在完成一长串任务时极易出错。

original: Lloyd: According to the defense,[p/] the saboteur stole a Rod of Mending and used it to sabotage very [i]specific[/i] sections of the refinery.
translation: Lloyd: 根据辩方的说法，[p/]破坏者偷了一根修复之杖，并用它来破坏精炼厂的<u>特定</u>部分。

original: Lloyd: I would never trust a Construct to discreetly complete such an intricate set of tasks unsupervised.
translation: Lloyd: 我绝不会信任构造体能单独，隐秘完成这样复杂的任务。

original: Lloyd: And before you ask,[p/] I was miles away from the refinery at the time of the accident.[p/] I have several associates who can confirm this alibi.
translation: Lloyd: 而且我要告诉你，[p/]事故发生时，我离精炼厂有好几英里远。[p/]有几个熟人可以证实我的不在场证明。

original: Lloyd: Therefore,[p/] I had no way of observing this Construct from afar.[p/] Nor did I have any way to communicate with it.
translation: Lloyd: 所以，[p/]我是没有办法在远处监督这个构造体的。[p/]我也无法与它进行沟通。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Noah: I was showing a visitor around the city.[p/] And for some reason,[p/] he really wanted to see the Aurinax Arcane Refinery.
translation: Noah: 我当时正带一个访客参观城市。[p/]出于某些原因，[p/]他很想看看欧奥耐克斯奥术精炼厂。

original: Noah: He was inspecting the machines there.[p/] When,[p/] suddenly,[p/] Mosourika ran up to us.
translation: Noah: 他正在察看那里的机器。[p/]突然间，[p/]莫苏里卡朝我们跑来。

original: Noah: She was desperately trying to tell us something,[p/] but there was just too much noise.
translation: Noah: 她拼命想跟我们说什么，[p/]但那里太吵了。

original: Noah: After a while,[p/] she just pointed at the walkway overlooking the refinery.[p/] That's where we saw someone fall into that accursed vat.
translation: Noah: 过了一会儿，[p/]她指向俯瞰精炼厂的走道。[p/]就在那儿，我们看到有人掉进那个该死的桶里。

original: Noah: ...There was a guard rail that [i]should[/i] have prevented him from falling.[p/] But he broke through it as he fell.
translation: Noah: ……有道护栏<u>本该</u>能阻止他掉下去的，[p/]但护栏直接断裂了。

original: Noah: Mosourika pointed it out.[p/] That's when we saw Justin fall.
translation: Noah: 莫苏里卡指向那里，[p/]我们就在这时目睹了贾斯汀坠落。

original: Noah: My companion stood there with me.[p/] He also saw Justin fall.
translation: Noah: 我的同伴就站在旁边，[p/]他也看到了贾斯汀坠落。

original: Noah: It was a bit far away.[p/] So, I couldn't see if there was any rust on the guard rail.
translation: Noah: 距离有点儿远。[p/]我看不出来护栏上是否有锈迹。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Mosourika: I was at the refinery when I heard a strange sound from the walkway.
translation: Mosourika: 我在精炼厂时听到走道那边传来奇怪的声音。

original: Mosourika: When I looked to see what it was,[p/] I saw that Justin had tumbled over the walkway's guard rail.
translation: Mosourika: 我循声望去，[p/]看到贾斯汀翻过了护栏。

original: Mosourika: But he hadn't fallen into the vat yet.[p/] I saw him barely hanging onto the edge of the platform.
translation: Mosourika: 但他还没掉进桶里，[p/]我看到他正勉强抓着平台的边缘。

original: Mosourika: I didn't know how to get to the walkway from there.[p/] So I looked around for help and found Mr. Morrison.
translation: Mosourika: 我不知道从那儿怎么上走道，[p/]所以我就在找地面上的人帮忙，然后发现了莫里森先生。

original: Mosourika: After that, he must have seen Justin lose his grip of the ledge and fall into the vat.
translation: Mosourika: 他肯定是在那之后看到贾斯汀抓不住边缘而掉进桶里的。
